This is the first section of the CRA SOC.

```{r}
library(shinylive)
```


```{shinylive-r}
#| standalone: true
#| viewerHeight: 500
library(shiny)
ui <- fluidPage(
  sliderInput("obs", "Observations:", 10, 200, 100),
  plotOutput("plot")
)
server <- function(input, output, session) {
  output$plot <- renderPlot({
    hist(rnorm(input$obs))
  })
}
shinyApp(ui, server)
```
